news.title: DARON MALAKIAN Recalls Childhood Obsession With OZZY & The Night SYSTEM OF A DOWN Covered BLACK SABBATH In Front Of BLACK SABBATH
news.summary: Daron Malakian, guitarist of Scars on Broadway and System of a Down, recently opened up about what Black Sabbath and Ozzy Osbourne meant to him. He recalls his childhood obsession with the two bands.
